unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Indiaâ€™s buzzing with film festival fever, folks!
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! India's buzzing with film festival fever, folks!

unnormalised: The film fest circuit is heating up faster than a Hyderabadi biryani on a Sunday afternoon. From the Himalayan Film Festival in Leh showcasing breathtaking landscapes to whispers of a revamped Kolkata International Film Festival coming later this year, cinephiles are spoilt for choice.
normalised: The film fest circuit is heating up faster than a Hyderabadi biryani on a Sunday afternoon. From the Himalayan Film Festival in Leh showcasing breathtaking landscapes to whispers of a revamped Kolkata International Film Festival coming later this year, cinephiles are spoilt for choice.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that several independent filmmakers are eyeing these festivals for premieres, hoping to gain traction before hitting the mainstream. Think of it as the ultimate litmus test!
normalised: Word on the street is that several independent filmmakers are eyeing these festivals for premieres, hoping to gain traction before hitting the mainstream. Think of it as the ultimate litmus test!

unnormalised: Remember that stunning debut film, "The Weaver's Song" by Priya Sharma? It apparently got its big break at the IFFI in Goa a couple of years back.
normalised: Remember that stunning debut film, "The Weaver's Song" by Priya Sharma? It apparently got its big break at the I F F I in Goa a couple of years back.

unnormalised: And it's not just about movies; it's the networking, the masterclasses (imagine learning from a Mani Ratnam!), and those late-night discussions fueled by chai and samosas.
normalised: And it's not just about movies; it's the networking, the masterclasses (imagine learning from a Mani Ratnam!), and those late-night discussions fueled by chai and samosas.

unnormalised: This year, buzz is building around Malayalam cinema, with many expecting a showcase similar to what we saw during Onam celebrations in Kerala.
normalised: This year, buzz is building around Malayalam cinema, with many expecting a showcase similar to what we saw during Onam celebrations in Kerala.

unnormalised: Keep your eyes peeled for updates and get ready to immerse yourself in the world of cinema!
normalised: Keep your eyes peeled for updates and get ready to immerse yourself in the world of cinema!
